tha-ap44:11.4: kusalabbhave → kusale bhave (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap44:18.2: pavarā ca sā → pavarāvayā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pavarā mayā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | pavarā piyā (?)
tha-ap44:22.2: parikkhatā → purakkhatā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
tha-ap44:33.1: āyasmā soṇo koḷiviso → soṇo koṭikaṇṇo (bj, mr) | soṇo koṭiyavesso (sya1ed, sya2ed) | soṇo koḷiyavesso (pts-vp-pli1ed)
